text:
It's with a heavy heart that we share the news that development on Emeris is on hold. We appreciate your support for all our efforts over the last few months and hope that your cross-chain adventure continues from here.

https://t.co/MlmCUJhTUX https://t.co/JatzGBHE6z

You can now earn #Staking rewards on 28 different tokens on Emeris! 

Simply stake from your portfolio page by selecting the asset of your choice. Find out the benefits of staking and why you may choose to stake with Emeris here: 
https://t.co/LqMUGDrWRC

description.string_value: We’re pleased to announce that you can now stake your assets using the Emeris interface. Emeris currently supports 28 chains (with more…

title.string_value: New Feature: Now You Can Stake Your Assets Using Emeris

text:
🚨BREAKING!🚨
Emeris has integrated the newly launched Crescent Network! @CrescentHub 💪

Crescent offers users: 
👉Next-gen interoperability 🚀
👉Vast rewards incentives 🔥
👉Cutting edge interchain DeFi investment tools 

Click here for more details 👉 https://t.co/rc0kNITHk1 https://t.co/Ck8g6u61Yc

mediaDetails.ext_alt_text: Check out the Crescent asset on Emeris: https://t.co/29y8Nqvqy5

photos.accessibilityLabel: Check out the Crescent asset on Emeris: https://t.co/29y8Nqvqy5

text:
Great news for Emeris users! Now you can stake a wide variety of tokens using the Emeris interface. 
Staking your tokens helps secure the network and provides you with rewards at the same time. 

Explore now 👉 https://t.co/N6zTB3VoCH

#Staking #Earn https://t.co/6qNyojWQTL

The Gravity DEX protocol is moving to a separate chain @CrescentHub 🌙 to provide enhanced cross-chain #DeFi opportunities. 
Find out what this transition means to you as an Emeris user and the steps you should take if you've been providing liquidity. 👇

https://t.co/CMXYEqTlQi https://t.co/rXnkzPT07z

🔊 Chain Integration Announcement

Emeris Beta has integrated 2 new chains, Comdex $CMDX & Sifchain $ROWAN. Now you can transfer & view your token balances all from inside the Emeris interface, with more functionalities, like swapping, to be added soon!
👉 https://t.co/sozJOsHIVn https://t.co/UP9xBYS4sG

🔊 Chain Integration Announcement 

Emeris Beta has integrated 7 new chains! Now you can transfer & view your token balances all from inside the Emeris interface, with more functionalities, like swapping, to be added soon! 
Welcome to Emeris 👉 
https://t.co/aS21vVl4VP https://t.co/x5qongoQFy

🔊 Coming soon to Emeris: Browser extension

Users will be able to:
👉 access Emeris through Emeris new browser extension wallet
👉 continue using existing solutions like @keplrwallet and other new wallets which will be added in the future

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/2e877hOA55

🔊 Coming soon to Emeris: Airdrops Tracker

Users will be able to:
👉 view all their airdrops on compatible chains in a comprehensive way
👉 check their eligibility to past and upcoming airdrops across many chains 
👉 claim airdrops directly from Emeris

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/RXd0xFgbUJ

🔊 Coming soon to Emeris: Cross-chain DEX aggregation

Users will be able to:
👉 access other DEXs like @osmosiszone, @sifchain, @junoswapdex, and more
👉 view and select the best quote for any swap

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/cEF5Y4CG5K

🔊 Coming soon to Emeris: Staking feature 

Users will be able to:
👉 V1: stake assets on all supported chains
👉 V2: auto-compound staking rewards on compatible chains

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/LblFAJ7cFK

📢 Chain Integration Announcement 

BitCanna, a decentralized payment network for legal cannabis is now available & fully functional on Emeris Beta. 
You can also view your balances for $BTSG & $XKI.

Welcome @BitSongOfficial @Ki_Foundation @BitCannaGlobal
https://t.co/hRoqPLkgSC https://t.co/hl7kVBI8Ay

📢 Emeris Support Center is now live! 📢

Find answers to commonly asked questions, such as getting started on Emeris, your portfolio, transactions & liquidity pools, or contact our dedicated support team by visiting the link below 👇

https://t.co/kptnn5CkUp https://t.co/hbrPzQo7Fv

🔊 Emeris —  Public Launch in Spring 2022 🎉

Since the launch of Emeris Beta back in Sept, we've been hard at work behind the scenes. Exciting upgrades are coming soon, from UX improvements to new features like DEX aggregation, an Airdrop page, and more!
https://t.co/ZMlUIX6QCN https://t.co/udGph5TC8J

🥳The Cosmos Shop has been Revamped!

The update includes some great Emeris~branded Swag like:
🎒 Backpacks
🧢 Hat 
👕 T-Shirt
🧥 Hoodies
📱 Phone Cases
...and more!
https://t.co/4gbAj9ZAoU

🎄Celebrate the holidays with us, use [HAPPYCOSMOSHOLIDAYS] in the shop for 20% off!
